sect1.title: APFEL++: A PDF evolution library in C++
sect1.para: APFEL++ is a C++ rewriting of the Fortran 77 evolution code APFEL (see http://apfel.hepforge.org and https://github.com/vbertone/apfel). APFEL++ is based on a completely new code design and guarantees a better performance along with a more optimal memory management. The new modular structure allows for better maintainability and easier extensibility. This makes APFEL++ suitable for a wide range of tasks: from the solution of the DGLAP evolution equations to the computation of deep-inelastic-scattering (DIS) and single-inclusive-annihilation cross sections. Also more complex computations, such as differential semi-inclusive DIS and Drell-Yan cross sections, are easily implementable in APFEL++.

sect2.title: Homebrew (macOS)
sect2.para: APFEL++ is available through the Homebrew-hep tap of Homebrew. After having installed Homebrew and tapped Homebrew-hep, the latest stable release of APFEL++ can be downloaded and installed with: brewinstallapfelxx
